page.title: 05SURVEY: DOMESTIC DWELLINGS
page.content: We sent out a questionnaire about life in the area and had about 200 replies, not all of them complete. 100 houses were built before 1970, half of them before 1900. 30 houses (including mobile homes) were built in the last 10 years and 4 were built this year. Because of local quarries, twice as many were built of Cotswold stone than anything else. 90 houses have garage facilities, sometimes in outbuildings. 85 houses have vegetable and flower gardens, 60 have just flower gardens and 1 has just a vegetable patch. 1 has no garden at all. An equal number of dwellings use logs and electricity for heating. Oil is used by the least number (40) and the most used fuel is coal. There is no gas available in the area. 116 homes are owner occupied and 23 are rented.
